snippet: The reluctance reflects a similar attitude in Washington toward the idea of sending small weaponry to the splintered Syrian insurgents, raising broader questions about the destiny of the rebels.
abstract: British government may be signaling more cautious approach to arming Syria's rebels, reflecting similar reluctance in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The reluctance reflects a similar attitude in Washington toward the idea of sending small weaponry to the splintered Syrian insurgents, raising broader questions about the destiny of the rebels.

headline.main: Britain Said to Step Back From Push to Arm Syrian Rebels
headline.print_headline: Britain: Government May Be Reluctant to Arm Syrian Rebels

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
